name: Yellow Brick Road II
overview: Glinda is being held captive in a magical crystal ball and must be saved! This sequel adventure to Yellow Brick Road is a two cd-rom set and was only released in Japan. A new great adventure in addition to the emergence of a new character creature who is half-man and half-fish, pottery people, and the turnip King. Again, the kingdom is in a big crisis. Glinda has been deprived of her liberty by the Witch of the West, who conspires to rule Emerald City. A combination of interactive mode while moving smoothly in a 3D space to solve events produces a new sense of entertainment! In addition to familiar members such as lion, scarecrow, and tin man, there is a stretching of the nihilistic tone. There is a musical, and there is spectacle, and you engage in a powerful story. Hiroyuki Miura directs the work.
